title: Bianxing Jingche Po Li Jiaotong Anquan Pian
title_japanese: 变形警车珀利 交通安全篇
synopsis: The story takes place in the small town of Blooms. The police car "Poli", the ambulance "Amba", the fire truck "Roy" and the helicopter "Haili" formed a rescue team with Xiao Juan to protect the people in the town. Peaceful and happy life. Kevin and Dokki are two lively and naughty elementary school boys. They often get into trouble because they don't obey the traffic rules. Fortunately, everyone from the rescue team helps each time. (translated from youku)
